SELECT hotelName FROM hotel h LEFT JOIN roomInfo r ON r.hotelNum = h.hotelNum WHERE h.hotelNum = #{hotelNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel(hotelNum, partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro,hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2 ) VALUES ( #{hotelNum}, (SELECT PARTNERNUM FROM PARTNER WHERE PARTNERID = #{partnerId}), #{hotelName}, #{hotelIntro}, #{hotelNumber}, #{hotelZip}, #{hotelAddr1}, #{hotelAddr2} )
mapper.select: SELECT h.hotelNum, p.partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2, imageFileNum hotelImageFileNum, saveFilename hotelSaveFilename FROM hotel h JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum LEFT JOIN hotelImage hi ON h.hotelNum = hi.hotelNum WHERE p.partnerId = #{partnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelImage(imageFileNum, hotelNum, saveFilename) VALUES (hotelImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{hotelNum}, #{hotelSaveFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.roomNum FROM roomInfo r JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelNum = r.roomNum WHERE h.hotelNum = #{hotelNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomInfo(roomNum, hotelNum, roomName, roomPrice, roomHo, roomMen, roomOption, roomBed ) VALUES ( #{roomNum}, #{hotelNum}, #{roomName}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomHo}, #{roomMen}, #{roomOption}, #{roomBed} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.roomNum, roomName, roomPrice, roomHo, roomMen, h.hotelName, h.hotelNum, h.partnerNum, roomOption, roomBed, imageFileNum roomImageFileNum, saveFilename roomSaveFilename FROM roomInfo r JOIN hotel h ON h.hotelNum = r.hotelNum JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum LEFT JOIN roomImage ri ON r.roomNum = ri.roomNum WHERE p.partnerId = #{partnerId}
